modName: The Sword of Talos-A Legend Reborn _OVER 1000 Satisfied_
summary: It has been long believed that Talos was in a great battle in Skyrim before the elves came.  He fought valiantly, but he lost his sword. It was long thought to be forgotten until now...
descriptionHtml:
---------------------------------------------------- DESCRIPTION---------------------------------------------------------

The sword of the warrior God Talos has returned to Skyrim after 500 years.  It has fallen into your hands Dragonborn.  You must decide the fate of Talos's sword.  Will it be used to cleanse the dungeons and caves of those nasty foes or will it be used to kill every human being on this region of Tamreil.  The choice is yours.  Though do take my warning. Talos also can play games.

---------------------------------------------------- STATS-----------------------------------------------------------------

Base Damage: 25
Enchantments: Absorb Health 25 points
Uses: Approx. 15
Speed: 6x faster
Reach: 5x farther
Value: 10000+ 
Location: WhiteRun. Go left at the entrance and keep going around the turn until you reach a rather large rock. You will Encounter the Spirit of Talos and his Minions to receive the Talos Set.

--------------------------------------------UPCOMING ITEMS-------------------------------------------------------------
Quest line
New Texture
Armor Set DONE!!!
Other tweaks and improvements


---------------------------------------------------- INSTALLATION--------------------------------------------------------

1. Download Mod
2. Add mod using NMM (Nexus Mod Manager)
3. Activate Mod
4. Play!

---------------------------------------------------- UNINSTALL---------------------------------------------------------

1. Deactivate Mod in NMM (Nexus Mod Manager)
2. DONE!!

---------------------------------------------------- BUGS----------------------------------------------------------------

THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO BUGS!!!


----------------------------------------------------PLAYER RIGHTS -----------------------------------------------------

You have permission to video the mod.
DO NOT DISTRIBUTE WITHOUT PERMISSION
DO NOT ALTER THIS IN ANYWAY
DO NOT TAKE CREDIT FOR THIS MOD
DO HAVE A GREAT TIME KILLING STUFF!!!!!


-------------------------------------------SPECIAL THANKS--------------------------------------------------------------
I would like to thank everyone for making this my most successful mod yet! Please remember to endorse me to get more updates! Thanks again!
author: Jobbomb6

files.name: Sword Of Talos V2
files.changelogHtml:
Lowered base damage (As suggested)
Changed sword mesh to a Nord Hero Sword to be more Lore-Friendly (As suggested)
Other tweaks

files.name: Sword of TalosV2_1
files.changelogHtml:
New Boss to obtain the great sword!
Sword now has a more reasonable feel to it.
Small tweaks to performance.

files.name: Sword of Talos 2_5
files.changelogHtml:
Added Talos armor se3t as requested! (New textures hopefully soon.)
Added Minions of Talos
Changed Talos' texture to Deathlord
Made some tweaks and adjustments to the sword.
